claim_text: This Annual Report on Form 10-K contains forward-looking statements.
source_quote: contain forward-looking statements

claim_text: Actual results may differ materially from those expressed in forward-looking statements.
source_quote: Actual results and outcomes may differ materially from those expressed in forward-looking statements

claim_text: Amazon.com, Inc. and its subsidiaries are included when "Amazon.com," "we," and "our" are used.
source_quote: herein, "Amazon.com," "we," "our," and similar terms include Amazon.com, Inc. and its subsidiaries, unless the context indicates otherwise.

claim_text: The Company organizes its operations into three segments: North America, International, and Amazon Web Services ("AWS")
source_quote: These segments reflect the way the Company evaluates its business performance and manages its operations.

claim_text: The Company serves primary customer sets consisting of consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees.
source_quote: thinking. In each of our segments, we serve our primary customer sets, consisting of consumers, sellers, developers, enterprises, content creators, advertisers, and employees.

claim_text: Our net sales is contained in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note 10 - Segment Information."
source_quote: our net sales is contained in Item 8 of Part II, "Financial Statements and Supplementary Data - Note 10 - Segment Information."

claim_text: Consumers access our offerings through our websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physically visiting our stores.
source_quote: Customers access our offerings through our websites, mobile apps, Alexa, devices, streaming, and physically visiting our stores.

claim_text: Amazon manufactures and sells electronic devices.
source_quote: We also manufacture and sell electronic devices, including Kindle, Fire tablet, Fire TV, Echo, Ring, Blink, and eero

claim_text: Amazon offers subscription services such as Amazon Prime.
source_quote: In addition, we offer subscription services such as Amazon Prime

claim_text: Amazon Prime includes fast, free shipping.
source_quote: a membership program that includes fast, free shipping on

claim_text: Amazon Prime is a membership program.
source_quote: addition, we offer subscription services such as Amazon Prime, a membership program that includes fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items, access to award-winning movies and series, and other benefits.

claim_text: Amazon Prime includes fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items.
source_quote: addition, we offer subscription services such as Amazon Prime, a membership program that includes fast, free shipping on tens of millions of items, access to award-winning movies and series, and other benefits.

claim_text: Amazon operates North America and International fulfillment networks.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: North America and International fulfillment networks that we operate;

claim_text: Amazon utilizes co-sourced and outsourced arrangements in certain countries.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: North America and International fulfillment networks that we operate; co-sourced and outsourced arrangements in certain countries;

claim_text: Amazon provides digital delivery of products.
source_quote: We fulfill customer orders in a number of ways, including through: North America and International fulfillment networks that we operate; co-sourced and outsourced arrangements in certain countries; digital delivery;

claim_text: Amazon operates global customer service centers.
source_quote: We operate customer service centers globally, which are supplemented by co-sourced arrangements.

claim_text: Amazon operates customer service centers globally.
source_quote: We operate customer service centers globally

claim_text: Amazon earns fixed fees, a percentage of sales, per-unit activity fees, interest, or some combination thereof for its seller programs.
source_quote: We earn fixed fees, a percentage of sales, per-unit activity fees, interest, or some combination thereof, for our seller programs.

claim_text: AWS offers a broad set of on-demand technology services.
source_quote: which offers a broad set of on-demand technology services, including compute, storage, database, analytics, and machine learning, and other services.

claim_text: AWS serves developers and enterprises of all sizes.
source_quote: We serve developers and enterprises of all sizes, including start-ups, government agencies, and academic institutions, through AWS

claim_text: We provide advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others.
source_quote: Advertisers We provide advertising services to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others, through programs such as sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.

claim_text: Our businesses encompass a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels.
source_quote: Our businesses encompass a large variety of product types, service offerings, and delivery channels.

claim_text: The worldwide marketplace is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive.
source_quote: The worldwide marketplace in which we compete is evolving rapidly and intensely competitive

claim_text: Amazon faces competitors from many different industry sectors around the world.
source_quote: we face a broad array of competitors from many different industry sectors around the world

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors include physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retailers.
source_quote: physical, e-commerce, and omnichannel retailers

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors include publishers.
source_quote: publishers

claim_text: Amazon’s competitors include producers of the products we offer and sell.
source_quote: producers of the products we offer and sell

claim_text: Publishers, producers, and distributors of physical, digital, and interactive media are included.
source_quote: publishers, producers, and distributors of physical, digital, and interactive media of all types and all distribution channels;

source_quote: web search engines

claim_text: Comparison shopping websites are included.
source_quote: comparison shopping websites

source_quote: social networks

source_quote: web portals

source_quote: companies that provide e-commerce services

claim_text: Companies provide fulfillment and logistics services for themselves or for third parties.
source_quote: companies that provide fulfillment and logistics services for themselves or for third parties

claim_text: Companies provide information technology services.
source_quote: companies that provide information technology services

claim_text: Companies design, manufacture, market, or sell consumer electronics.
source_quote: companies that design, manufacture, market, or sell consumer electronics

claim_text: Amazon believes that selection, price, and convenience are principal competitive factors in its retail businesses.
source_quote: We believe that the principal competitive factors in our retail businesses include selection, price, and convenience, including fast and reliable fulfillment.

claim_text: Amazon’s seller and enterprise services are competitive based on the quality, speed, and reliability of its services and tools.
source_quote: Additional competitive factors for our seller and enterprise services include the quality, speed, and reliability of our services and tools, as well

claim_text: Our enterprise services include the quality, speed, and reliability of our services and tools.
source_quote: and enterprise services include the quality, speed, and reliability of our services and tools

claim_text: Some of our current and potential competitors have more customers.

claim_text: Some of our current and potential competitors have greater control over inputs critical to our various businesses.
